name: Frontline Inferno
summary: Step into the boots of a soldier from the Axis, Soviet, or Allied forces and engage in thrilling, rapid-fire battles across colorful, stylized battlegrounds. Frontline Inferno is an action-packed FPS arena shooter that combines the historical setting of World War II with an arcade twist, delivering frantic gunfights, instant respawns, and total freedom in how you gear up.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: How we made MULTIPLAYER FPS game in ONE WEEK | Frontline Inferno
